channel.title: CVE Feed for averta -- Slider & Popup Builder by Depicter – Add Image Slider, Carousel Slider, Exit Intent Popup, Popup Modal, Coupon Popup, Post Slider Carousel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for averta -- Slider & Popup Builder by Depicter – Add Image Slider, Carousel Slider, Exit Intent Popup, Popup Modal, Coupon Popup, Post Slider Carousel

item.title: CVE-2024-4390|2024-06-20T12:57:56.216Z -- averta -- slider%20%26%20popup%20builder%20by%20depicter%20%E2%80%93%20add%20image%20slider%2C%20carousel%20slider%2C%20exit%20intent%20popup%2C%20popup%20modal%2C%20coupon%20popup%2C%20post%20slider%20carousel
item.description: The Slider and Carousel slider by Depicter plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Arbitrary Nonce Generation in all versions up to, and including, 3.0.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor access and above, to generate a valid nonce for any WordPress action/function. This could be used to invoke functionality that is protected only by nonce checks.

item.title: CVE-2024-4390|2024-06-20T03:37:22.655Z -- averta -- slider%20%26%20popup%20builder%20by%20depicter%20%E2%80%93%20add%20image%20slider%2C%20carousel%20slider%2C%20exit%20intent%20popup%2C%20popup%20modal%2C%20coupon%20popup%2C%20post%20slider%20carousel
item.description: The Slider and Carousel slider by Depicter plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Arbitrary Nonce Generation in all versions up to, and including, 3.0.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor access and above, to generate a valid nonce for any WordPress action/function. This could be used to invoke functionality that is protected only by nonce checks.
